item.title: Temu’s parent company is trying to fend off competition from Alibaba — but it’s a costly fight
item.description: PDD is spending more to boost revenue, and its stock is rising as investors seem satisfied with the trade off.

item.title: In $18 billion deal to buy JDE Peet’s, Keurig Dr Pepper unwinds a 2018 marriage between soda and coffee
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. announced an $18 billion all-cash deal to acquire Dutch-based JDE Peet’s NV on Monday, a major bet on coffee for the U.S. drinks...

item.title: ‘I can only rely on me’: How do I protect myself from my parents’ nursing-home bills?
item.description: “I do not expect or need anything from my parents.”

item.title: Suze Orman reveals her favorite stock right now and the investing mistake that shaped her strategy
item.description: The personal-finance guru talks tech stocks, crypto and her targets for the S&P 500 and bitcoin.

item.title: I am a 65-year old single woman with 25 credit cards. How do I cancel them without hurting my credit score?
item.description: “I pay them off each month if I use them and don’t run a balance.”
